Functions

Types

Base.rand — Function
rand(mpp::MarkedPoissonProcess, n::Int=1)

Generate a couple of waiting time and mark realizations from the process mpp.

source
Base.rand — Function
rand(pp::PoissonProcess, n::Int=1)

Generate n waiting time realizations from the process pp.

source
Distributions.rate — Method
rate(mpp::MarkedPoissonProcess)

Return the ground rate of the Marked Poisson Process mpp.

source
Distributions.rate — Method
rate(pp::PoissonProcess)

Return the rate of the Poisson Process pp.

source
MarkedPoissonProcesses.compose — Method
compose(pps::Vector{PoissonProcess})

Construct the composed Poisson Process from the sub-processes pps.

source
MarkedPoissonProcesses.condprocess — Method
condprocess(mpp::MarkedPoissonProcess; threshold::Real)

Compute the marked Poisson Process conditional that the mark is larger than "threshold".

source
MarkedPoissonProcesses.ground — Method
ground(mpp::MarkedPoissonProcess)

Return the ground process.

source
MarkedPoissonProcesses.nevents — Method
nevents(mpp::MarkedPoissonProcess, t::Real)

Compute the expected number of events in the interval (0,t) of the Marked Poisson Process mpp.

source
MarkedPoissonProcesses.nevents — Method
nevents(pp::PoissonProcess, t::Real)

Compute the expected number of events in the interval (0,t) of the Poisson Process pp.

source
MarkedPoissonProcesses.prob — Method
prob(pp::PoissonProcess, t::Real)

Compute the probability that the next event will occur before t.

source
MarkedPoissonProcesses.thin — Method
thin(pp::PoissonProcess, α::Real)

Compute the Poisson process pp thinned with the factor (0 < α < 1).

source
MarkedPoissonProcesses.weibullfit — Method
weibullfit(y::AbstractArray{<:Real})

Compute the maximum likelihood estimates of the Weibull distribution parameters with maximum likelihood

source
Statistics.mean — Method
mean(tpd::Truncated{Weibull{Float64}, Continuous, Float64})

Compute the mean of the truncated Weibull distribution by numerical integration.

source
Statistics.mean — Method
mean(mpp::MarkedPoissonProcess)

Compute the expected waiting time before the next event and the expected mark of the Marked Poisson Process mpp.

source
Statistics.mean — Method
mean(pp::PoissonProcess)

Compute the expected waiting time before the next event of the Poisson Process pp.

source
Statistics.quantile — Method
quantile(pp::PoissonProcess, p::Real)

Computation of the time $s$ for which the probability of the next event occurring in the interval $(0, s)$ is p.

source
